text: Awo Yesu bwe yatuula okwolekera eggwanika ly’ensimbi, n’alaba engeri ekibiina ky’abantu gye bateekamu ensimbi mu ggwanika. Abagagga bangi baali bateekamu ensimbi nnyingi.12:41 Etterekero ly’ensimbi mu yeekaalu lyabeeranga mu luggya lw’abakazi. Abasajja n’abakazi bakkirizibwanga mu luggya olwo, kyokka ng’abakazi bo bakoma awo, ate abasajja bo nga beeyongerayo munda mu yeekaalu
